response.original_title: คอนเสิร์ตแบบเบิร์ดเบิร์ดโชว์ ครั้งที่ 6 ตอน อยากเห็นท้องฟ้าเป็นอย่างในฝัน
response.overview: Yak-Hen-Thong-Fa-Pen-Yang-Nai-Fan is the name of the episode of the 6th Bird Bird Show concert, held from 16 - 28 August 1994, held at the main auditorium, Thailand Cultural Center, for 16 shows, number of people. Viewed by 32,000 people, this concert featured Thai art and culture, Likay, with him as the lead performer along with Seri Wangnaitham, a national artist, and a musical performed with students. T Myria, with newly composed songs such as Yesterday, True Love, Empty Arms, etc.
response.title: Babb Bird Bird Show #6/1994 Yak-Hen-Thong-Fa-Pen-Yang-Nai-Fan
